Text: Thanks a lot! Do you know when Oct 17th episode will be up? Thank you!
I'm not going to be uploading on here anymore... The Soup can be downloaded from the site Magzcrib... just do a google search for Magzcrib, and it's the first website
Thanks for answering, I just bookmarked it!

Really, no more?? Sorry to harass, I know you do this out of the kindness of your heart.. the Magzcrib site seems a tad dodgy, the links are bursting with popups and forced signups... it's a bit creepy. Wish you'd reconsider ;-)

Magzcrib site is great... i promise not dodgy at all!  That's where I've always gotten all of the shows I've uploaded... you should try again... I've never had any problems with pop-ups or sign-ups, so not sure what you're talking about...
Just use Adblock in Chrome, you won't get any ad or pop-up whatsoever!

Thanks so much for sharing!  I just wanted to request that if you upload any more episodes of The Soup, that you use the following date format in the filename:  YYYY MM DD

It may seem like a small thing, but if you don't use that format then programs like Media Center Master can't properly fetch the metadata.  Thanks!!
